00030 /**
00031  * Abstract for the exception class
00032  *
00033  * @author      Jean-David Gadina <macmade@eosgarden.com>
00034  * @version     1.0
00035  * @package     TYPO3
00036  * @subpackage  oop
00037  */
00038 abstract class tx_oop_Core_Exception_Base extends Exception
00039 {
00040     /**
00041      * Wheter to print the backtrace or not, when an exception is not caught
00042      */
00043     protected static $_debug        = true;
00044     
00045     /**
00046      * The common CSS styles for the HTML elements produced by this class
00047      */
00048     protected static $_commonStyles = 'font-family: Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 10px; color: #898989;';
00049     
00050     /**
00051      * Class constructor
00052      * 
00053      * The class constructor is declared so the message argument is mandatory.
00054      * 
00055      * @param   string  The exception message
00056      * @param   int     The exception code, if any
00057      * @return  NULL
00058      */
00059     public function __construct( $message, $code = 0 )
00060     {
00061         // Calls the Exception constructor
00062         parent::__construct( $message, $code );
00063     }
00064     
00065     /**
00066      * Returns the exception message with the backtrace if required
00067      * 
00068      * @return string   The exception message prepended with the backtrace if required
00069      * @see     getInfos
00070      */
00071     public function __toString()
00072     {
00073         // Checks the debug state
00074         if( self::$_debug ) {
00075             
00076             // Prints the backtrace
00077             print $this->getInfos();
00078         }
00079         
00080         // Returns the exception message
00081         return get_class( $this ) . ' exception with message "' . $this->message . '"';
00082     }
00083     
00084     /**
00085      * Creates an H1 title
00086      * 
00087      * @param   string  The title text
00088      * @return  string  The H1 tag
00089      */
00090     protected function _traceTitle( $title )
00091     {
00092         // Returns a title
00093         return '<h1 style="' . self::$_commonStyles . ' color: #0062A0;">' . $title . '</h1>';
00094     }
00095     
00096     /**
00097      * Create an information section about a trace information
00098      * 
00099      * @param   string  The label to display
00100      * @param   string  The text to display
00101      * @return  string  The information section
00102      */
00103     protected function _traceInfo( $label, $value )
00104     {
00105         // Creates the label DIV
00106         $labelDiv = '<div style="' . self::$_commonStyles . ' font-weight: bold;">' . $label . '</div>';
00107         
00108         // Creates the value DIV
00109         $valueDiv = '<div style="' . self::$_commonStyles . '">' . $value . '</div>';
00110         
00111         // Returns the trace information
00112         return '<div style="margin-bottom: 5px;">' . $labelDiv . $valueDiv . '</div>';
00113     }
00114     
00115     /**
00116      * Gets the trace history
00117      * 
00118      * @return  string  The formatted full backtrace
00119      * @see     _traceInfo
00120      * @see     _getArgs
00121      * @see     _getCode
00122      */
00123     protected function _traceHistory()
00124     {
00125         // Gets the trace array
00126         $traceArray = $this->getTrace();
00127         
00128         // Storage
00129         $str        = '';
00130         
00131         // Checks the trace array
00132         if( is_array( $traceArray ) ) {
00133             
00134             // Process each trace entry
00135             foreach( $traceArray as $key => $value  ) {
00136                 
00137                 // Gets the available informations from the trace entry
00138                 $file     = ( isset( $value[ 'file' ] ) )                              ? $this->_traceInfo( 'File:', $value[ 'file' ] )                                            : '';
00139                 $line     = ( isset( $value[ 'line' ] ) )                              ? $this->_traceInfo( 'Line:', $value[ 'line' ] )                                            : '';
00140                 $function = ( isset( $value[ 'function' ] ) )                          ? $this->_traceInfo( 'Function:', $value[ 'function' ] )                                    : '';
00141                 $class    = ( isset( $value[ 'class' ] ) )                             ? $this->_traceInfo( 'Class:', $value[ 'class' ] )                                          : '';
00142                 $type     = ( isset( $value[ 'type' ] ) )                              ? $this->_traceInfo( 'Call type:', ( ( $value[ 'type' ] == '::' ) ? 'static' : 'member' ) ) : '';
00143                 $code     = ( isset( $value[ 'file' ] ) && isset( $value[ 'line' ] ) ) ? $this->_traceInfo( 'Code:', $this->_getCode( $value[ 'file' ], $value[ 'line' ] ) )       : '';
00144                 
00145                 // Checks for arguments
00146                 if( isset( $value[ 'args' ] ) && is_array( $value[ 'args' ] ) && count( $value[ 'args' ] ) ) {
00147                     
00148                     // Gets the pased arguments
00149                     $args = $this->_traceInfo( 'Arguments:', $this->_getArgs( $value[ 'args' ] ) );
00150                     
00151                 } else {
00152                     
00153                     $args = '';
00154                 }
00155                 
00156                 $str .= '<div style="margin-top: 5px; padding: 5px; border: solid 1px #D3E7F4; background-color: #FFFFFF;">' . $class . $function . $type . $file . $line . $args . $code . '</div>';
00157             }
00158         }
00159         
00160         return $str;
00161     }
00162     
00163     /**
00164      * Creates informations about arguments (type, value, etc)
00165      * 
00166      * @param   array   The arguments
00167      * @return  string  The formatted informations about the arguments
00168      */
00169     protected function _getArgs( array $args )
00170     {
00171         // Storage
00172         $argsList = '';
00173         
00174         // Process each argument
00175         foreach( $args as $argNum => $argValue ) {
00176             
00177             // Checks the type of the argument
00178             if( is_object( $argValue ) ) {
00179                 
00180                 // Object - Shows the class name 
00181                 $argType = 'Object: ' . get_class( $argValue );
00182                 
00183             } elseif( is_array( $argValue ) ) {
00184                 
00185                 // Array - Shows the number of entry
00186                 $argType = 'Array: ' . count( $argValue );
00187                 
00188             } elseif( is_bool( $argValue ) ) {
00189                 
00190                 // Boolean - Shows the value
00191                 $argType = 'Boolean: ' . ( ( $argValue ) ? 'true' : 'false' );
00192                 
00193             } elseif( is_int( $argValue ) ) {
00194                 
00195                 // Integer - Shows the value
00196                 $argType = 'Integer: ' . $argValue;
00197                 
00198             } elseif( is_float( $argValue ) ) {
00199                 
00200                 // Float - Shows the value
00201                 $argType = 'Floating point: ' . $argValue;
00202                 
00203             } elseif( is_resource( $argValue ) ) {
00204                 
00205                 // Resource - Shows the resource type
00206                 $argType = 'Ressource: ' . get_resource_type( $argValue );
00207                 
00208             } elseif( is_null( $argValue ) ) {
00209                 
00210                 // NULL
00211                 $argType = 'Null';
00212                 
00213             } elseif( is_string( $argValue ) ) {
00214                 
00215                 // String - Shows the value
00216                 $argType = ( strlen( $argValue ) > 128 ) ? 'String: ' . htmlspecialchars( substr( $argValue, 0, 128 ) ) . '[...]' : 'String: ' . htmlspecialchars( $argValue );
00217                 
00218             } else {
00219                 
00220                 // Unknown
00221                 $argType = 'Other';
00222             }
00223             
00224             // Adds the current argument
00225             $argsList .= $argNum . ') ' . $argType . '<br />';
00226         }
00227         
00228         // Returns the list of the arguments
00229         return $argsList;
00230     }
00231     
00232     /**
00233      * Gets some PHP code line from a file
00234      * 
00235      * This method will return the requested line from the requested PHP file,
00236      * as well as 4 line before and 4 lines after, if available.
00237      * 
00238      * @param   string  The path to the PHP file
00239      * @param   int     The line to get
00240      * @return  string  The formatted PHP lines
00241      */
00242     protected function _getCode( $file, $line )
00243     {
00244         // Gets all the lines from the file
00245         $lines = file( $file );
00246         
00247         // Checks the lines array
00248         if( is_array( $lines ) ) {
00249             
00250             // Length of the last line
00251             $lineLength = strlen( $line + 3 );
00252             
00253             // Gets the given line
00254             $line3      = ( isset( $lines[ $line - 1 ] ) ) ? '<strong style="color: #0062A0;">' . str_pad( $line, $lineLength, 0, STR_PAD_LEFT ) . ': ' . $lines[ $line -1 ] . '</strong>' : '';
00255             
00256             // Gets some lines above and below the given one
00257             $line0      = ( isset( $lines[ $line - 4 ] ) ) ? str_pad( $line - 3, $lineLength, 0, STR_PAD_LEFT ) . ': ' . htmlspecialchars( $lines[ $line - 4 ] ) : '';
00258             $line1      = ( isset( $lines[ $line - 3 ] ) ) ? str_pad( $line - 2, $lineLength, 0, STR_PAD_LEFT ) . ': ' . htmlspecialchars( $lines[ $line - 3 ] ) : '';
00259             $line2      = ( isset( $lines[ $line - 2 ] ) ) ? str_pad( $line - 1, $lineLength, 0, STR_PAD_LEFT ) . ': ' . htmlspecialchars( $lines[ $line - 2 ] ) : '';
00260             $line4      = ( isset( $lines[ $line ] ) )     ? str_pad( $line + 1, $lineLength, 0, STR_PAD_LEFT ) . ': ' . htmlspecialchars( $lines[ $line ] )     : '';
00261             $line5      = ( isset( $lines[ $line + 1 ] ) ) ? str_pad( $line + 2, $lineLength, 0, STR_PAD_LEFT ) . ': ' . htmlspecialchars( $lines[ $line + 1 ] ) : '';
00262             $line6      = ( isset( $lines[ $line + 2 ] ) ) ? str_pad( $line + 3, $lineLength, 0, STR_PAD_LEFT ) . ': ' . htmlspecialchars( $lines[ $line + 2 ] ) : '';
00263             
00264             // Returns the lines
00265             return '<div style="' . self::$_commonStyles . ' white-space: pre; font-family: monospace; border: solid 1px #D3E7F4; background-color: #EDF5FA; padding: 5px; margin-top: 5px;">' . $line0 . $line1 . $line2 . $line3 . $line4 . $line5 . $line6 . '</div>';
00266         }
00267         
00268         // No lines
00269         return '';
00270     }
00271     
00272     /**
00273      * Decide wether to display the backtrace or not when an exception is
00274      * not caught.
00275      * 
00276      * @param   boolean True if the backtrace must be displayed, otherwise false
00277      * @return  boolean The previous value
00278      */
00279     public static function setDebugState( $value )
00280     {
00281         // Gets the previous state
00282         $oldState     = self::$_debug;
00283         
00284         // Sets the new state
00285         self::$_debug = ( boolean )$value;
00286         
00287         // Returns the previous state
00288         return $oldState;
00289     }
00290     
00291     /**
00292      * Gets the informations about the exception
00293      * 
00294      * @return  string  The formatted informations bout the exception
00295      * @see     _traceTitle
00296      * @see     _traceInfo
00297      * @see     _traceHistory
00298      */
00299     public function getInfos()
00300     {
00301         // Creates the formatted output
00302         $trace = '<div style="' . self::$_commonStyles . ' background-color: #EDF5FA; border: solid 1px #D3E7F4; margin: 10px; padding: 10px;">'
00303                . $this->_traceTitle( 'Exception of type \'' . get_class( $this ) . '\'' )
00304                . $this->_traceInfo( 'Message:', $this->message )
00305                . $this->_traceInfo( 'Code:',    $this->code )
00306                . $this->_traceInfo( 'File:',    $this->file )
00307                . $this->_traceInfo( 'Line:',    $this->line )
00308                . $this->_traceTitle( 'Debug backtrace:' )
00309                . $this->_traceHistory()
00310                . '</div>';
00311         
00312         // Returns the informations
00313         return $trace;
00314     }
00315 }
